purpose: To highlight key attributes and expansion strategy of First Interstate Bank.
title: First Interstate Bank headquartered in Billings, MT is Montana’s largest bank

bullets.text: First Interstate is a community, branch-focused bank focused on its traditional client base – think established ranchers
Many branches and markets operate like individual banks and have a strong in ‘frontier spirit’ as a result of a large and spread out geographical footprint
The bank is actively acquiring new banks, including Bank of the Cascades

layout: Split with text on left and map on right

visual_elements.label: State map indicating bank expansion areas
Bank of the Cascades and First Interstate Bank
